title: MIFXIN Armless Accent Chair Covers Water-Repellent Knitted Stretch Slipper Chair Couch Slipcovers Removable Washable Furniture Protector Covers for Living Room Home Hotel (Grey Blue)
features: 【Premium Material】MIFXIN accent chair covers are made of 92% Polyester and 8% Spandex Fabric, high elasticity, soft and anti-wrinkle. No pilling and fadeless, durable for long use. Suitable for use in all seasons, the decoration of many places as living room, family dining room, bedroom, hotel, meeting room, office, wine bars, celebration, ceremony, .etc. Also a great gift for your family, friends and your loved ones.

【Perfect Fit】Suitable for slipper chair size: Back Length: 54.6~64.8cm/21.5~25.5 '', Back Height (above Seat): 33.0~43.1cm/13.0~17.0 '', Back Thickness:12.5~17.8cm/5.0~7.0''. Seat Length: 53.3~58.4cm/21.0~23.0 '', Seat Width: 46.4~56.5cm/18.25~22.25 '', Seat Thickness: 22.9~27.9cm/9.0~11.0 ''(Please refer to the product size chart, and measure your chair before purchasing to ensure the best fit).

【Chair Protector & Home Decor】Armless chair slipcover can not only protect your chair from stain, pet hair & damage, but also give your chair an entirely fresh new look if your chair looks a bit broken or not so new. It’s great for homes with children and pets. Quickly update your old chair with our beautiful chair slipcovers.

【Stay in Place】Constructed with thick elastic band to cover the bottom edges well for a full protection, hassle free for wrinkle, keep staying in place firmly, high recommended for both leather and cloth furniture.
【Easy to Install and Care】Our chair slipcovers are soft fabric, highly stretch and easily install and remove for wash. Hand washable and machine washable. Do not bleach, do not iron.
description: Package Include: Only 1 Pcs * Accent Chair Cover
Made of soft polyester and spandex fabric, makes our accent chair covers more stretchy and durable, ensuring both good function and comfort.

Chair slipcover can protect armless chair from dirt, pill, stain, tear and scratch of pet. Keep your furniture brand new. Perfect for homes with kids and pets. If you are looking to upgrade and decorate the look of the chair, just choose it. You can sit on it to drink coffee, read a book and chat with friends.

Armless Chair Slipcover adopts the elegant stylish design, simple and fashionable, in line with the contemporary aesthetic trend and minimalism. Elegant tonal is in harmony with your household style, perfect fusion.

This decorative accent chair cover not only can be used in the dining room and living room, but also provide a comfortable seating area in your office to reduce your fatigue. Can be widely used for home decoration, hotel, meeting, wedding, celebration, ceremony, etc.

Machine washable for easy maintenance, separately in cold water on the gentle cycle. Using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach and iron. Wrap around the covers and adjust to get a new style and look.
